name: An Essay on Insipidity
description:
"An Essay on Insipidity" is a purposely bad RTP-made game that aims to be a quick character study and observation of a poverty-living honduran child named Ernesto, who uses RPG Maker to make a game to try and cope with the harsh reality he lives in.

The dialog is a mishmash of broken to unintelligible english and spanish.

I made this in one week in RPG Maker MZ Trial Version to test the engine.

Features
  • Bad grammar;
  • Bad tileset placement/map design;
  • Bad story, pacing and narrative;
  • Easy battles with enemies that have large pools of HP;
  • 1+ hours of gameplay
  • It's a RTP-made game.
